title: Sterling Hotels
description: Sterling Hotels operates in the hospitality industry, known for its sophisticated and tranquil aesthetic. The brand's color palette consists of a calming spectrum from deep blues (3B5A6F, 002054) and blacks (000000) to neutral grays (828A87, 838F97), complemented by lighter, serene hues of blue (9DB7C4, CCD7DD). This distinct palette emphasizes elegance and serenity, with the colors sourced from their official brand manual available at https://issuu.com/anterleenamaiti/docs/sterling_brand_manual.
